titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS FUNDED NURSING CARE (YEAR TO DATE) - Description

div.p: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS FUNDED NURSING CARE (YEAR TO DATE) is the total number of PERSONS eligible for NHS-funded Nursing Care for any period within the year to date, i.e. eligible for NHS-funded Nursing Care any time between 1 April and up to and including the last day of the REPORTING PERIOD.
